description:
Built on the race tested Optimo frame, the CAAD Optimo 2 will have you fighting with the pack on your weekend club rides and help shave minutes off your commute. The proven frame delivers the same geometry and handling of a high-end road bike, while saving some money for kit. A responsive Tiagra drivetrain puts 20 hill-flattening gears right at your fingertips. While Promax brakes keep the potential speed of your new road bike right where you want it.

  • Smartform C2 alloy frame with a carbon blade fork and performance cyclocross geometry
  • Shimano Tiagra groupset with FSA Omega cranks
  • Promax RC-476 dual pivot caliper brakes offer plenty of stopping power
  • 2x10 drivetrain pairs 50-34T chain rings with an 11-32T cassette
  • SAVE™ Micro-suspension uses strategically engineered flex zones in the rear triangle to smooth out the ride
  • Subtle rack and Fender mounts in the rear triangle
  • Vittoria Zaffiro tires have confidence inspiring traction and a smooth roll
  • Bikes are covered by MEC's Rocksolid Guarantee and Bike Service Agreement. You can bring your bike to any MEC bike shop for free adjustments and minor maintenance for two years after purchase
  • Due to challenges with supply chain, components may be substituted for comparable parts at any time. The listed build is how MEC intended your bike to arrive, though the manufacturer may need to make a tweak or two to get you riding sooner
